name: Dirtbox (1.0)
description:
Version 1.0

Dirtbox is a sandbox game where you can walk around and place 3d objects such as cubes, cylinders, etc. to express your creativity!

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys = Walk Around

Space = Jumpd

Right Click = Place Object

Left Click = Destroy Object

E/Q = ChooseThrough Objects (TOP LEFT)
